title: Amazon replaces plastic air pillows with recycled paper for North American packaging
summary: Amazon is replacing plastic air pillows with recycled paper filler in North American packaging to address environmental concerns. The company has already replaced 95% of plastic air pillows in delivery packaging and aims for full removal by the end of the year. This initiative represents Amazon’s largest plastic packaging reduction effort in North America, avoiding nearly 15 billion plastic air pillows annually. By Prime Day this year, almost all customer deliveries will exclude plastic air pillows.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 454110 - Electronic Shopping and Mail-Order Houses, 493110 - General Warehousing and Storage, 722513 - Limited-Service Restaurants, 493190 - Other Warehousing and Storage

title: Latest Global Carpet Tile and LVT Collections from Interface Explore Crafted Textiles and Natural Forms
summary: Interface, Inc. unveiled its latest global carpet tile and luxury vinyl tile collections, offering innovative and sustainable flooring solutions that aim to create beautiful and high-performing spaces through modular tiles with eye-catching textures and patterns. The products, named Etched & Threaded and Earthen Forms, are designed with a focus on design, sustainability, and performance, aligning with the company's commitment to environmental progress and creating purposeful spaces.
